narrative.title: 9Th Australian Division - 1941Q1
narrative.situation: British Australian Infantry Division (2nd AIF) deployed in North Africa during 1941Q1.
narrative.objectives: Infantry Division - offensive and defensive operations in desert terrain
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Desert warfare training in Palestine and Egypt
High morale and esprit de corps from Australian volunteer force (2nd AIF)
Experienced WWI veteran leadership at brigade and division levels
